actions.description: The tower sage makes two Arcane Burst attacks and can use Starry Radiance if available.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) radiant damage.
actions.name: Arcane Burst

actions.description: Dazzling light bursts from the tower sage's fingertips in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the blinded condition until the end of the tower sage's next turn.
actions.name: Starry Radiance (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The tower sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: Dancing Lights, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation

1/day each: Arcane Lock, Burning Hands, Comprehend Languages, Detect Magic, Levitate, Mage Armor
actions.name: Spellcasting
